item.title: Uses
item.description: Get to know the tech and apps I currently use day-to-day.
item.content:encoded: Get to know the tech and apps I currently use day-to-day.
item.author: codaxtech@gmail.com (Alexis Guzman)

item.title: Install Node JS on Linux
item.description: We will see how to install Node.js and NPM in Linux in an easy and fast way, we will do it by installing NVM (Node Version Manager).
item.content:encoded: We will see how to install Node.js and NPM in Linux in an easy and fast way, we will do it by installing NVM (Node Version Manager).
item.author: codaxtech@gmail.com (Alexis Guzman)

item.title: Build React/Next apps most fast and efficiently
item.description: Can we save the time we spend configuring our React and Next projects? With Reex CLI we will save a few minutes.
item.content:encoded: Can we save the time we spend configuring our React and Next projects? With Reex CLI we will save a few minutes.
item.author: codaxtech@gmail.com (Alexis Guzman)

item.title: Uppercase the first letter of a string in JS
item.description: With JavaScript we can do one thing in different ways and it can be a bit threatening, now we will see one of those occasions.
item.content:encoded: With JavaScript we can do one thing in different ways and it can be a bit threatening, now we will see one of those occasions.
item.author: codaxtech@gmail.com (Alexis Guzman)

item.title: Center elements with CSS
item.description: Centering things is something we do every day, so why not learn all the possible ways to do it?
item.content:encoded: Centering things is something we do every day, so why not learn all the possible ways to do it?
